subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: When Billy Casper grabbed a 5-iron during the 1959 United States Open and laid up short of the green on Winged Foot's 216-yard par-3 third hole, he said no one in the gallery laughed, booed or fainted.
snippet: When Billy Casper grabbed a 5-iron during the 1959 United States Open and laid up short of the green on Winged Foot's 216-yard par-3 third hole, he said no one in the gallery laughed, booed or fainted.
